dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
dcterms:description: The KITTI 2012 dataset is a benchmark suite for evaluating stereo vision algorithms, consisting of various driving scenarios captured in real-world conditions, providing ground truth data for stereo matching tasks.
dcterms:title: KITTI 2012

dcterms:creator: M. Menze
A. Geiger
dcterms:description: The KITTI 2015 dataset extends the KITTI benchmark with additional data for object scene flow, providing a comprehensive dataset for evaluating algorithms in the context of autonomous vehicles.
dcterms:title: KITTI 2015
